NEW COVER AND NEW TYPE-FACE HAVE ADDED TO THE ATTRACTIVE-
NESS OF THE NEWSLETTER.
2. The NAEB Membership Directory has been changepin format
SOMEWHAT FOR EASIER REFERENCE AND WILL HEREAFTER BE
PUBLISHED SEMI-ANNUALLY RATHER THAN ANNUALLY.
3* A NEW CARD FILE SYSTEM HAS BEEN INSTITUTED WHICH MAKES
MORE COMPLETE AND UP-TO-THE-MINUTE INFORMATION READILY
available about NAEB MEMBERS, former members, applicants
FOR MEMBERSHIP, NETWORK MEMBERS AND NON-MEMBER EDUCATIONAL
STATIONS.
L. An IMPROVED SYSTEM FOR PROCESSING ALBUM ORDERS HAS BEEN
INSTITUTED WHICH SHOULD INCREASE EFFICIENCY AND PRACTICALÂ¬
LY ELIMINATE CAUSE FOR COMPLAINT.
